attributes.action: PRIVATE SECTOR PENSIONS PROTECTED THE SAME AS PUBLIC SECTOR FINAL SALARY PENSIONS
attributes.additional_details: The private sector pensions have been hit hard and they need protecting to the same level as public sector pensions so returns are guaranteed .The people bringing in work place pension reforms all have a final salary pensions. All we want is the same level of protection so we no what we will get when the pension fund matures
